hackathon-eligibility: participation is limited to university students, or those who have left school within 2015-2016 school year.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: First place at DerbyHacks wins an MLH Medal and Dell Venue 10s
Second place at DerbyHacks wins a MLH Medal and Hero RC XQ-5 Headless QUadcopter
Third Place at DerbyHacks wins a MLH Medal and a PNY 256GB USB 3.0 Flash Drive
Whoever makes the best IoT Hack at DerbyHacks wins a Particle Photon Maker Kit.
Whoever makes the best Health Hack at DerbyHacks wins a FitBit Flex.
Whoever makes the coolest hack that serves no purpose wins a Wooden pre-assembled Useless Box.
Whoever wins the American Showman award, a prize for best pitch, wins a mystery prize from KFC.
Whoever comes up with the best hack related to using Big Data for City Management wins $1500 in AWS Credit.
Whoever wins best use of Syncano wins a mystery prize from Syncano

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Swain Student Activities Center, 2100 S Floyd St, Louisville, KY 40208, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does the application demonstrate technical competence/knowledge?
Is the idea original? Has it never been done before?
Were the presenters clear, and did they communicate their idea effectively?

Is the application aesthetically pleasing?
Is it easy to use?

hackathon-location-address: Swain Student Activities Center, 2100 S Floyd St, Louisville, KY 40208, USA
hackathon-description-header: DerbyHacks, a Hackathon at the Derby city!
hackathon-location-description: University of Louisville - Swain Student Activity Center
